__e: I'd do it again to save my little brother.
It was nice having you as my little brother.
So how does it feel having a little-brother-type figure in your life?
Here's one for the younger brother range -
Guys, look, I don't know what's going on with my brother.
What's it like to have a little brother?
And t-tell the little man I said, you know...
But yes, we're for the little guy.
You know, for a little guy, he's...
I'll be all right in a minute.
For a second I wanted to believe it could work. If I could...
Just a half moment more, and then she must speak!
Not some little boy, still living at home with his momma.
But my little boy visits me sometimes, and it matters...
You mean the little kid who came up to me asking me questions?

"Hey, there, where you going with that little boy?"
She heard about you and that little girl.
So this has nothing to do with that little girl over there?
